name: Best-books-sellers- API
body:
Best Sellers Books - API specification



This is a web service for third-party who want to use the Best-Sellers-Books app.


In this app we will use Node js for the basic functionality.


First thing we will need to do is to make the server (server.js) running...


URL Description Example
best-books-sellers.herokuapp.com Showing all the best sellers books by Json objects { Name: "Ronaldo", year: "1989", BSMonth: "March" },{...},{...}..
best-books-sellers.herokuapp.com/name/BOOKID Showing the requested book with the specific name of it (BOOKID) { Name: "Ronaldo", year: "1989", BSMonth: "March" }
best-books-sellers.herokuapp.com/BSForMonth/bookmonth Showing array of books with the requested month of them/it (bookmonth) { Name: "Gerrard", year: "2010", BSMonth: "June" }, { Name: "Zidan", year: "2011", BSMonth: "June" }
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
